::Aerotaur::
    His legs begin to throb from the holes still in them, but he ignores the 
pain.  He continues hacking at the door until the hole is big enough for him 
to get through.  He runs through to Nightlight.  "Nightlight?  Are you okay?  
Can you here me?"
